properties.description: Welcoming space where customers can access free weekly events such as Knit & Natter and Baby Rhyme Time. Computer access and puzzles are also available for public use.
properties.title: Angmering Library

properties.address: 32 South Farm Rd, Worthing, West Sussex BN14 7AE
properties.description: A Community Hub which provides free tea or coffee and a space to meet others and reduce isolation. For those struggling to manage there is a Food and Pet Pantry as well as a Uniform exchange.
properties.title: Broadwater Support Community Hub

properties.address: Cathedral Centre, Arundel, West Sussex BN18 9BA
properties.description: Tuesday Drop-In 2.00 to 4.00pm, offering a warm welcome, tea, coffee and biscuits, along with good company, every Tuesday until 19th March.
properties.title: Cathedral Centre, Arundel

properties.address: Connaught Theatre, West Sussex BN11 1LG
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 7th January 2024** From Monday 8th January 2024 until Monday 11th March 2024 Fraser’s Bar - Upstairs in the Connaught Theatre will be open on Mondays between 3pm – 8pm, with free hot drinks, Baked goods, activity packs, books, board games and a kindness rack ( with free warm clothes that anyone is welcome to take). On Monday evenings we will also have representatives from different charities and support groups to offer advice and raise awareness. Keep an eye out on our website for who will be coming and when. https://wtm.uk/warmspaces/ We will also be distributing free cinema tickets for Monday evenings and Saturday morning pictures through partnerships with local community groups and advice giving organisations who directly support those in need.
properties.title: Connaught Theatre ( Frasers Bar)

properties.description: A warm friendly space offering free tea/coffee/hot chocolate & biscuits. Newspapers, jigsaws, board games available. Come and meet old friends or make new ones.
properties.title: Cuppa & Chat Plus

properties.description: A public library on two floors . Public toilets available

properties.title: Maybridge Community Church

properties.address: The Salvation Army, West Sussex PO21 1DW
properties.description: A space for all to connect. On Tuesdays we offer support and community. On Wednesdays, we promote an intergenerational space, where toddlers and their parents/carers can mix with the wider community. On Fridays, 'Family Open House' is aimed at parents with children up the age of 18. In partnership with 'Family Support Work', the space offers food, support and sharing of parenting and life skills. Term Time Only. A range of drinks are available free, but we ask for £1 to receive breakfast rolls (Tues) and soup (Weds).
properties.title: Open House

properties.address: The Wickbourne Centre, Littlehampton, West Sussex BN17 7DZ
properties.description: We're open for anyone to come in and relax. There are various activities for families during the week, plus we have Playcentre pre-school and Refresh coffee shop on site, and access to support services such as Early Help and CAP Debt Help.
properties.title: The Wickbourne Centre

properties.address: Bognor Regis Methodist Church, West Sussex PO21 1ST
properties.description: A safe place where all are welcome. Join us for a cuppa, a conversation and at lunchtime, hot soup and a roll. We are open from 10.00-2.00 every Friday. We always have a jigsaw on the go and the table tennis is always set up! We offer a warm, safe space where you can chat, sit quietly, charge your phone, have something hot to drink.
properties.title: Well-Come Point

properties.address: Worthing Museum, West Sussex BN11 1HP
properties.description: Worthing Museum and Gallery is available as a Warm Space with exhibitions and displays for every age. We even have a book corner! The venue will be open on the following days/times. Free hot drinks, baked goods and activity packs will be available on Thursdays, 3pm – 8pm. On Thursday evenings we will also have representatives from different charities and support groups to offer advice and raise awareness. Keep an eye out on our website for who will be coming and when. https://wtm.uk/warmspaces/ Wed 10am – 5pm Thurs 10am – 8pm ( 3-8pm hot drinks and baked goods) Fri 10am – 5pm Sat 10am – 5pm Sun 11am – 3pm Worthing Museum : Chapel Rd, Worthing BN11 1HP
properties.title: Worthing Museum & Art Gallery

properties.description: Broadwater Support has a community Hub at 32 South Farm Rd BN14 7AE. It includes a Community Pantry for those who are struggling to manage. It also offers a Pet Pantry, School Uniform centre and a free cafe where people can have free drinks and chat to the volunteers. The Warm Hub will be open weekday afternoons from 12:30 until 3pm. Everybody is welcome.

properties.description: Mondays 10:00-13:00 apart from Christmas Day and New Years Day. Wednesdays 10:00-13:00 from January. Also available to advise on other services available in Worthing, provide blankets and sleeping bags, emergency food parcels and a grant toward clothing in our Salvation Army charity shop.
